chain.description: It seems that there was an error in retrieving the 120-hour forecast for Yosemite National Park. Let me try again.

I apologize, but it seems that there is an issue with retrieving the weather forecast for Yosemite National Park at the moment. Unfortunately, I am unable to provide you with the 120-hour forecast or hiking trail suggestions at this time. I recommend checking a reliable weather website or contacting the National Park Service for the most up-to-date information on the weather conditions and hiking trails in Yosemite National Park.

function.name: points_point_forecast_hourly_for_national_weather_service
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "national_weather_service", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Hourly forecast data for a point. This response is derrived from the /gridpoints endpoint and is intentionally less structured. If more structure is required, developers should use the /gridpoints endpoint directly. Example: /points/39.0693,-94.6716/foreca"

function.name: products_types_typeid_for_national_weather_service
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "national_weather_service", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "A list of products by type. Example: /products/types/AFD"

typeid.description: typeId: an id of a valid product type

function.name: points_point_forecast_for_national_weather_service
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "national_weather_service", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Forecast data for a point. The DWML format is a temporary format to aid transition and will be sunset at a later date. This response is derrived from the /gridpoints endpoint and is intentionally less structured. If more structure is required, developers s"

function.name: severe_weather_alerts_for_weather
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "weather", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get servere weather alerts from local meteorlogical agencies (US, EU, and Isreal supported )"

function.name: get_120_hour_forecast_for_weather
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "weather", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Returns a forecast for up to 120 hours in the future (default 48 hours)"

units.description: I = Imperial, S = Scientific, M = Metric (Default)

function.name: get_5_day_forecast_for_weather
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "weather", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "3 hour interval - 5 day forecast for a given lat/lon"

units.description: I = Imperial, S = Scientific, M = Metric (Default)

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

answer_generation.query: I want to surprise my family with a spontaneous road trip to Yosemite National Park. Can you give me a 120-hour forecast for the park? Additionally, suggest some hiking trails and scenic spots we shouldn't miss.
